content: groups and organizations outside the Hybrid kingdoms that resist their rule, but they are largely ineffective due to lack of resources, technology, and unity. Some are small, underground groups that engage in sabotage and guerrilla tactics, while others are larger, more organized resistance movements that aim to overthrow the Hybrid governments. However, these movements are often infiltrated by Hybrid spies, and their leaders are usually captured and executed. Despite this, some still hold onto the hope of one day overthrowing the Hybrid rule and restoring humanity's freedom.
